name: Block'hood VR
description: Blockâ€™hood VR is a neighborhood-building simulator that celebrates the diversity and experimentation of cities and the unique ecosystems within them. Budding city planners will have access to 200+ building blocks to create unique neighborhoods and discover the implications of their designs.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or better Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: HDMI 1.3, 2 USB 3.0 ports. VR Only!
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7 7820 or greater Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 1080 Storage: 2 MB available space Additional Notes: HDMI 1.3, 2 USB 3.0 ports. VR Only!
